name: TYPED'82
description:
Typed'82

A slightly polished unity engine based typing experience/prototype.

It is probably for someone with a passion for testing out keyboards and wanting to see an eye-pleasing typing demo simultaneously. Maybe just me. Who knows? The actual game is in development and supports different typing modes than random words and probably more languages, music, etc.

How to Play

The evaluation begins by typing the first letter and ends after 60 seconds. Press "space" to cycle to the next word, make sure you write the word correctly since you cannot correct it afterwards. Your results should show up after the evaluation ends.

Controls

F1- Restart the round
ESC- Exit full-screen mode
SPACE - Switch to the next word
RETURN - Switch to the next word
